post.body: well you know i dont keep up with all your sayings!
never mind the fact that it features you! let's not get into details on here of what I think of you though. ;)
latest post on your blog has me addicted to your blog now. Is it bad to be addicted to a man's blog thats alot older than me?
your box? What exactly does that mean? I am envisioning you literally bouncing a box.clearly im cluless.
umm, that was to you i cant keep up with the blog posts
i cant keep up with the blog posts
i have no idea. but that does definatelly suck!!
I need to get ready for the day.6am? 7hrs too early for me. I minus well be a couch potato the way I live my life. Be back later if im lucky
Is It bad to be addicted to the internet? I mean I could be addicted to worse things couldnt I? The internet is my only true addiction!
I have 253 updates? And i am a bad twitter-Er i wonder how many ALL you twitter Addicts have @dragonlady38 i am talking to you LOL!
I'll need several cups of today. The people I am going to the party with tonight are major party-ers. We will be out late. I am warned!
THATS it I am officially signing up to go back to school in January!
Im up at 5 am for yet another day of shopping then a bithday party tonight.BUT the question is why am I up at 5 am to go shopping at 11 am?
how do you people do the hearts?? enlighten me
i dont want to shop at all next year so friggin annoyed
a birthday tomorrow one wednesday and then christmas then another birthday and one saturday! why so we have all the festivities this week?
i am now realizing that dropping out of school was my worst decision i have ever made in my life. what can 1 do with a 10th grade education?
